author: Gabriella L
title: Wonderful experience. The hotel is opulent and historic. - Review
text: Stayed here with friends for three nights. Staff were friendly and professional. Breakfast each morning was hot and delicious. Beds were comfortable. Would recommend highly and would stay here again. The hotel is located in the center of Paris and made it very easy to get around to see the sights. It was close to vicinity of restaurants as well.
